item.title: Content Creator and Content Moderator - Upwork
item.description:
Role Overview:
We are seeking a talented Media & Content Creator to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for developing engaging and high-quality content across various media platforms to promote our app, FoneMe. This role requires a creative and strategic thinker who can produce compelling content that resonates with our target audience.

Key Responsibilities:

• Content Creation: Produce high-quality written, visual, and multimedia content, including blog posts, articles, videos, infographics, and social media posts.
• Social Media Management: Develop and execute social media strategies to increase brand awareness and engagement on platforms such as Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, and YouTube.
• Video Production: Create, edit, and publish promotional and tutorial videos showcasing the features and benefits of FoneMe.
• Graphic Design: Design visually appealing graphics, illustrations, and layouts for various marketing materials and platforms.
• Content Strategy: Collaborate with the marketing team to develop and implement a comprehensive content strategy aligned with our brand and business goals.
• SEO Optimization: Optimize content for search engines to improve visibility and organic search rankings.
• Analytics: Monitor and analyze content performance metrics to refine strategies and improve engagement.
• Collaboration: Work closely with developers, marketers, and other stakeholders to ensure cohesive and effective content delivery.

Qualifications:

• Proven experience as a Content Creator, Social Media Manager, or similar role.
• Strong portfolio showcasing a range of content types and media formats.
• Proficiency in content creation tools such as Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, Premiere Pro), Canva, and video editing software.
• Excellent writing, editing, and proofreading skills.
• Knowledge of social media platforms, trends, and best practices.
• Experience with SEO and content optimization techniques.
• Strong analytical skills and the ability to interpret data to drive content decisions.
• Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
• Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously.

Hourly Range: $3.00-$10.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 16:12 UTC
Category: Content Moderation
Skills:Content Writing, Content Creation, Marketing, Content Management, Research & Strategy, Content Moderation
Skills: Content Writing, Content Creation, Marketing, Content Management, Research & Strategy, Content Moderation
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Reel Creator - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor who can create captivating reels for our clients. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of storytelling and be able to showcase our clients' brand or product in a visually compelling way. You will be responsible for selecting and editing footage, adding graphics and effects, and ensuring the final product meets our clients' expectations.  As a Video Reel Creator, you should have proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro. Attention to detail, creativity, and the ability to meet deadlines are essential.

Skills needed:
- Video editing
- Storytelling
- Adobe Premiere Pro
- Final Cut Pro
- Attention to detail
- Creativity

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 25, 2024 15:53 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Videography, Video Commercial
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Videography, Video Commercial
Country: United States

item.title: Social Media Video Content Creator - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented individual to create engaging social media video content for the launch of our limited edition 3D printed light fixtures. The videos should showcase the uniqueness and beauty of our products while effectively communicating their features and benefits. The content should be visually stunning, attention-grabbing, and optimized for various social media platforms.

    Responsibilities:
    - Conceptualize and storyboard video ideas
    - Shoot and edit high-quality videos
    - Add relevant captions, text overlays, and graphics
    - Optimize videos for social media platforms
    - Collaborate with our marketing team to ensure brand consistency

    Skills:
    - Video editing software proficiency (e.g. Adobe Premiere Pro)
    - Creative storytelling and visual communication
    - Knowledge of social media platforms and best practices
    - Strong attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines

    This is a medium-sized project with an estimated duration of 1 to 3 months. We are looking for an intermediate-level video content creator who can bring our vision to life and make our limited edition launch a memorable success.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$50.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 15:52 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Social Media Marketing, Video Production, Social Media Management, Facebook
Skills: Video Editing, Social Media Marketing, Video Production, Social Media Management, Facebook
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Instagram Growth Specialist and Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking an experienced Instagram growth specialist and video editor to help us organically grow followers for a personal Instagram profile. The ideal candidate should have a deep understanding of Instagram algorithms and strategies for gaining followers. Additionally, they should possess strong video editing skills and a creative eye for enhancing raw content. As an Instagram growth specialist, you will be responsible for developing and implementing effective growth strategies, engaging with the target audience, and optimizing content for maximum visibility. As a video editor, you will be tasked with editing and enhancing video content to make it visually appealing and engaging. You will have to create and upload content daily. If you are passionate about social media, creative, and have a proven track record of growing Instagram profiles, we would love to hear from you.

Skills needed:
- Instagram growth strategies
- Social media marketing
- Video editing
- Creativity
- Content optimization


Posted On: June 25, 2024 15:44 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Social Media Marketing, Instagram, Video Editing, Social Media Management
Skills: Social Media Marketing, Instagram, Video Editing, Social Media Management
Country: Netherlands

item.title: Experienced Make Money Online YouTube Video Editor for FACELESS YOUTUBE VIDEOS - Upwork
item.description:
Are you an experienced video editor with a knack for creating engaging, high-quality content? We are looking for a talented individual to join our team and edit videos for our "Make Money Online" YouTube channel to edit FACELESS VIDEOS. This is a long-term project with the potential for a stable, ongoing partnership.

**Responsibilities:**

- Edit YouTube videos using actual footage relevant to the content, avoiding random stock footage.
- Ensure clean, professional editing that is easy on the eyes, with no loud colors.
- Incorporate appropriate graphics, transitions, and effects from software like Motion Array and Envato Elements.
- Collaborate with the content team to ensure the videos align with the channel’s style and goals.
- Meet deadlines and manage multiple projects simultaneously.

**Requirements:**

- Proven experience as a video editor with a portfolio showcasing your work.
- Examples of previous work that demonstrate your ability to use actual footage effectively.
- Prior work experience on Upwork with positive reviews.
- Subscriptions to necessary software such as Motion Array, Envato Elements, etc.
- Strong attention to detail and ability to maintain a consistent style.
- Excellent communication skills and ability to work as part of a team.

**Budget:**

- The budget for this project is $10,000. This is flat rate project for 8 to 15 minutes. This is only an estimate. videos could be longer or shorter.  Bids should range from $40 to $80 per video. Only the lowest bids from individuals who are qualified will be considered for the job.
- This is an ongoing project, and we value long-term relationships with our freelancers. We have a history of keeping freelancers on our team for years, so delivering high-quality work could lead to a long-term position.

**Application Instructions:**

- Submit your portfolio and examples of relevant work.
- Provide your lowest bid considering the long-term nature of the project.
- Only apply if you meet all the requirements and have the necessary work experience on Upwork.
- Due to high volume, we may not respond to bids that are too high or from applicants who do not meet the requirements.

**How to Apply:**

Please send your application, including your portfolio and bid, through Upwork. We look forward to seeing your work and potentially welcoming you to our team for a rewarding long-term collaboration.

This is the style of editing we are looking for but videos will be Faceless
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZDG2XMOcOXo



Budget: $10,000
Posted On: June 25, 2024 15:36 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Edit videos in Descript - Upwork
item.description:
Looking to bring someone onto the team for consistent work through the rest of the year.  Your role will be to transform hour long Zoom Discussion Groups into polished videos using Descript:
https://www.descript.com/download/other-device  I will pay you to edit by the word ($1/180 words) in the script.

In addition to editing the video, you are also responsible for cleaning up the transcript to make sure it accurately reflects what is being said in the video.  You will also need to adjust capitalization to comply with our company Style Guide:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1R9FtRJ48ccSe4IYOSs5uKYFGSZw3l7lOsHhDpaNPwYU/edit

Ideal candidate is a quick learner and has an excellent grasp of the English language.  

Here are detailed instructions for the role:  https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ePCDl_hvtdHch04ACX4DxlKRxW0wfu2p3NPlvpf05SM/edit

Here are examples of finished videos:  https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLGd_Hl6NWLZfPu01s6FVfHBxf2rB2awG_

Thanks for your application — I look forward to working with you.

Budget: $20
Posted On: June 25, 2024 15:34 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Thumbnail Editor/Designer for YouTube & Instagram - Upwork
item.description:
Job Description: We are seeking a talented and creative Thumbnail Editor to join our team. The ideal candidate will have experience in designing engaging and visually appealing thumbnails for YouTube and Instagram. Your work will play a crucial role in attracting viewers and increasing our content engagement.

Responsibilities:
- Design eye-catching and clickable thumbnails for YouTube videos.
- Create visually appealing thumbnails for Instagram posts.
- Ensure thumbnails align with our brand’s style and message.
- Collaborate with our content team to understand the context and requirements of each thumbnail.
- Deliver high-quality work within specified deadlines.

Requirements:
- Proven experience in creating thumbnails for YouTube and Instagram.
- Strong portfolio showcasing your design skills and creativity.
- Proficiency in graphic design software (e.g., Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator).
- Ability to understand and implement feedback effectively.
- Strong attention to detail and a good eye for aesthetics.
- Excellent communication skills/willingness to join team Slack channel.

How to Apply: Please send us the following:
1. Your portfolio or examples of your previous thumbnail designs.
2. Your fee for designing one thumbnail.
3. A brief introduction about yourself and your experience in thumbnail design.

Payment: We request that you provide your fee for creating one thumbnail. If we find your work aligns with our needs and budget, we will engage you as our primary thumbnail editor moving forward.


Posted On: June 25, 2024 15:27 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Graphic Design, Photo Editing, Social Media Imagery, YouTube, Instagram
Skills: Graphic Design, Photo Editing, Social Media Imagery, YouTube, Instagram
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Youtube Video Editing - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for an expert in video creation who can put visuals to a recording.
The project will mainly be all about products on Amazon, reviews, etc.
The candidate should be a strong communicator and quick learner.
The videos must be delivered within 48 hours.
I am ready to pay more, if the candidate will manage my YouTube channel, and do the SEO, etc.
I am also ready to pay more, if the candidate can also write great engaging scripts and produce good-quality voiceovers.

There's lots of potential for the right candidate!
I have multiple projects lined up and just looking to hire the right candidate.
If the candidate has an agency and can manage a few projects at a time (as time will tell) I will place a few orders at a week.

Looking to hear from the talented people out there.

Budget: $30

item.title: Cinematic Youtube Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for an experienced video editor that uses Adobe Premier Pro! I am creating a storytime video with 2 parts; a video w/ commentary, then photo/video popups overlayed on top of that commentary. Similar to this video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VD9p9tEP9RE

You will be doing the following;
- Creating a youtube video that is 15-20 minutes long
- Making the YouTube video engaging using photos & video provided

This video needs to be TOP TIER and look very professional and engaging. Creative thinking is needed for this.

Hourly Range: $20.00-$60.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 15:22 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: TikTok Creation & Management - Upwork
item.description:
Need someone to create a TikTok theme page for the business / investing niche.

You will be:
- Creating a new account with TikTok US account.
- Downloading videos from other accounts within this niche.
- Edit the video slightly to avoid complete copy and add our brand logo on.
- Repeat this consistently, with 1-2 videos per day.
- Update me on results weekly or bi-weekly.
- Write "tiktok" in the beginning of the cover letter to be reviewed.

Could be long-term or management of more than 1 account and little work.

Hourly Range: $3.00-$10.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 15:19 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Content Creation, Social Media Management, Marketing Strategy, Social Media Marketing
Skills: Social Media Content Creation, Social Media Management, Marketing Strategy, Social Media Marketing
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply
